trans. Andrew Hurley.}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the [[Long Blades]] category. It is a one handed weapon.}} '''Scimitars''' are the best of the "common" one-handed [[Long Blades]]. While you may eventually wish to upgrade to a [[demon blade]] or a [[double sword]], you can use a scimitar while you're still waiting to find one.
